title: R&B Singer Erykah Badu Raises $3.60 Singing On The Street
teaser: The Grammy Award-winning singer said, "I just kinda always wanted to see what it would be like to sing for money on the streets." For whatever reason, she didn't get much cash dropped into her hat.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
